text: @MattHancock @BorisJohnson They think ppl will cooperate after the St. Dom debacle? PM Cummings & Boris Johnson, have just thrown thousands more under the Covid-19 bus. Many will refuse to take further instructions. Consequently there will be less social distancing, an increase in cases & more deaths.
